comments.body: This actually matches `CodeGenerator.setColumn`, which copies the value before setting the value to an InternalRow.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +807,811 @@      keyVar.value.set(map.keyArray().get(i, keyVar.dataType))
      valueVar.value.set(map.valueArray().get(i, valueVar.dataType))
      val result = InternalRow.copyValue(functionForEval.eval(inputRow))
      resultKeys.update(i, result)
      i += 1
